reviewText: I love this dvd of game show classics, folks if you enjoy a simple time and place you will so enjoy this dvd, very sweet & so cute!
"To Tell the Truth" is one of my all-time favorite game shows, and this video presentation faithfully recreates the days when television was in its golden age.
Very poor, old film!!  The one show was not all there. Would not recommend it for anyone to buy it.
I loved watching those old game shows.  I only wished there were more of the shows on this DVD, and even wished there were more games shows like these today.

I thought I was buying a whole DVD series of the TV show: What's My Line?
This is a collection of TV shows instead.  What's My Line, Twenty-One, Tic Tac Dough, I've Got A Secret, Queen for a Day and finally To Tell The Truth. The DVD has a total of 185 minutes.
So happy to have this DVD! Video quality varies from fair to excellent. Audio quality is excellent. All around a great DVD considering the shows are over 50 years old.

I'd give this no stars if possible. It won't play in any DVD player I own. The few frames I WAS able to see were washed out and horrible looking, so maybe I didn't miss much.

The reviewer who rated this 5 stars must be a retailer of this title - a shill in other words.

This DVD includes 6 full length game shows: Twenty-One, Tic Tac Dough, What's My Line, To Tell The Truth, I've Got A Secret, and Queen For A Day. After watching the over 185 minute DVD, it was quite satisfying to look back at those old game shows.
